tooltip.itemmagnetmod.magnet_distance: Controls how far the magnet works.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.magnet_durability:
Controls the durability of the magnet.
§сRequires restart§r.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.indestructible: Controls whether the magnet breaks when picking up items.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.core_in_bastion:
Controls whether a Magnet Core can be found in Bastions Remnants.
§сRequires restart§r.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.core_in_ancient_ci:
Controls whether a Magnet Core can be found in Ancient Cities.
§сRequires restart§r.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.core_in_end_city:
Controls whether a Magnet Core can be found in End Cities.
§сRequires restart§r.
tooltip.itemmagnetmod.core_in_stronghold:
Controls whether a Magnet Core can be found in Stronghold Libraries.
§сRequires restart§r.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.itemmagne: This mod adds an item magnet to the game. It can be toggled on and off, and it loses strength for each item picked up.
